reqs:
Pre-reqs: PHAR 469.
Term 1_"Institutional Clerkship"
Please note that the Clerkship start and end dates may not be the same for all students. Some will start on Aug 7th-Sept 1st, Sept 4th-Sept 29th, Oct 2nd-Oct 27th, or Oct 30th-Nov. 24th. The OEE Office will assign your date and locaton. If you have further questions please contact their Office. If your clerkship starts in August, please register in Yr4STT-A, and the Program Advisor will register you in the correct PHAR 489 section.
Term 1_"Institutional Clerkship"
Please note that the Clerkship start and end dates may not be the same for all students. This is the section that runs Aug 7th-Sept 1st. If you know that your clerkship starts in August, please register in Y4STT-A, and the Program Advisor will register you in PHAR 489 section 003.
Term 2_"Institutional Clerkship"
Please note that the Clerkship start and end dates may not be the same for all students. Some will start on Jan 1st-Jan 26th, Jan 29th-Feb 23rd, Feb 26th-Mar 23rd, or Mar 26th-Apr 20th. The OEE Office will assign your date and locaton. If you have further questions please contact their Office.
description: A 160-hour pharmacy clerkship emphasizing integration of knowledge and skills in developing and assessing therapeutic plans for patients in institutional practice.
